create_layers_activity::title: Create Layers Activity
create_layers_activity::clip_card_0::goa: Place the subject or character in a distinct layer from the rest of the image.
create_layers_activity::text_card_0::tex: Now that you've completed the lesson on creating layers in a photo, this activity will help you practice. Start by taking photos with two distinct layers, one with a clear subject and another that provides context.
